overview: Inspired by the Chaplin silent film era of the 1920s, this twelve-minute short follows the adventures of Chastine as she roller skates into a perilous world filled with thugs and strangers. Alone and forced to rely solely on her wits, Chastine thwarts a gang of thugs, using a broken pair of roller skates to retrieve her beloved bottle of Chanel perfume.
title: Chastine
